acceptance-test-run.title: Verify successful creation of a post
acceptance-test-run.name: verify_successful_creation_of_a_post

test-step.description: Navigate to manage job ads page
Select region for the jobpost: {All Australia}
Select area for the jobpost: {Everywhere in Australia}
